original_text: So David and Abishai went to the army by night, and there was Saul, lying asleep inside the camp with his spear stuck in the ground near his head. Abner and the soldiers were lying around him.
korean_text: 다윗과 아비새가 밤에 그 백성에게 나아가 본즉 사울이 진영 가운데 누워 자고 창은 머리 곁 땅에 꽂혀 있고 아브넬과 백성들은 그를 둘러 누웠는지라

sentences.original_text: So David and Abishai went to the army by night
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 다윗과 아비새가 밤에 군대로 갔습니다

sentences.original_text: with his spear stuck in the ground
Abner and the soldiers were lying around him
sentences.korean_translation: 아브넬과 병사들이 그의 주위에 누워 있었습니다
